titleStmt.title: A chymical physician. Who cures all diseases curable incident to mankind, easeth all afflicted spirits; and in fine, performs all that may be in astrology and physick with that infallibility, that never yet any has done; ...
titleStmt.author: Case, John, Dr.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Second paragraph starts: "By J. Case, ..."; and at end: "where ever may be J. Case.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
